adjectives.description: hemisphered (comparative more hemisphered, superlative most hemisphered)

entries.meaning: Shaped into a hemisphere or hemispheres.
examples: [T]hose which they call the eyes of Crabs, Lobsters, Shrimps, and the like, and are really so, are Hemispher'd, almost in the same manner as these of Flies are.

entries.meaning: Having a (dominant) cerebral hemisphere of a specified kind.
examples: Objects situated in the right half of vision of a left-hemisphered infant would, by appearing larger, attract its attention.
